content: i am very happy with this new pattern one for the boys a very sweet little v-neck long-sleeved cardigan knitted from the top-down and with just two little sleeve seams to join 3 sizes - newborn 6 months and 12 months requires ~ dk yarn 4mm needles 4 small buttons matching hat and blanket also available **to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓**
